name: Shoot Em Up (Chiew)
description:
A short school project made with Stencyl.

Player has to defeat the boss to win the game. But in the meanwhile player can collect item that randomly spawned to upgrade or heal up. The boss will also will go for the healing items too.

Movement keys: W to move up, A to move left, S to move down, D to move right, Space bar to shoot, Q to shield up.
